remarks: The group sum over the real numbers, expressed as a finite sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Jun-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 19-Jul-2019.)
statement:
regsumsupp $p |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( RRfld gsum F ) = sum_ x e. ( F supp 0 ) ( F ` x ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d I x $.
$d V x $.
